name: conduit
desc: The core libraries of the Conduit framework.

name: APIConfiguration
desc: A Configuration to represent an external HTTP API.

name: baseURL
desc: The base URL of the described API.

name: clientID
desc: The client ID.

name: clientSecret
desc: The client secret.

name: Application
desc: This object starts and stops instances of your ApplicationChannel.

name: channel
desc: The ApplicationChannel handling requests while under test.

name: document
desc: Creates an APIDocument from an ApplicationChannel.

name: isRunning
desc: Whether or not this application is running.

name: isolateStartupTimeout
desc: The duration to wait for each isolate during startup before failing.

name: logger
desc: The logger that this application will write messages to.

name: options
desc: The options used to configure this application.

name: server
desc: The ApplicationServer listening for HTTP requests while under test.

name: start
desc: Starts this application, allowing it to handle HTTP requests.

name: startOnCurrentIsolate
desc: Starts the application on the current isolate, and does not spawn additional isolates.

name: stop
desc: Stops the application from running.

name: supervisors
desc: A list of isolates that this application supervises.

name: ApplicationChannel
desc: An object that defines the behavior specific to your application.

name: close
desc: You override this method to release any resources created in prepare.

name: documentAPI
desc: Creates an OpenAPI document for the components and paths in this channel.

name: documentComponents
desc: Tells this object to add its components to context.

name: entryPoint
desc: You implement this accessor to define how HTTP requests are handled by your application.

name: initializeApplication
desc: You implement this method to provide global initialization for your application.

name: logger
desc: The logger that this object will write messages to.

name: messageHub
desc: Use this object to send data to channels running on other isolates.

name: options
desc: The configuration options used to start the application this channel belongs to.

name: prepare
desc: You override this method to perform initialization tasks.

name: securityContext
desc: The context used for setting up HTTPS in an application.

name: server
desc: The ApplicationServer that sends HTTP requests to this object.

name: willStartReceivingRequests
desc: You override this method to perform initialization tasks that occur after entryPoint has been established.

name: ApplicationMessageHub
desc: An object that sends and receives messages between ApplicationChannels.

name: add
desc: Sends a message to all other hubs.

name: close
desc: Closes the sink.

name: listen
desc: Adds a listener for messages from other hubs.

name: ApplicationOptions
desc: An object that contains configuration values for an Application.

name: address
desc: The address to listen for HTTP requests on.

name: certificateFilePath
desc: The path to a SSL certificate.

name: configurationFilePath
desc: The absolute path of the configuration file for this application.

name: context
desc: Contextual configuration values for each ApplicationChannel.

name: isIpv6Only
desc: Whether or not the application should only receive connections over IPv6.

name: isUsingClientCertificate
desc: Whether or not the application's request controllers should use client-side HTTPS certificates.

name: port
desc: The port to listen for HTTP requests on.

name: privateKeyFilePath
desc: The path to a private key.

name: ApplicationServer
desc: Listens for HTTP requests and delivers them to its ApplicationChannel instance.

name: ApplicationServer
desc: Creates a new server.

name: channel
desc: The instance of ApplicationChannel serving requests.

name: close
desc: Closes this HTTP server and channel.

name: didOpen
desc: Invoked when this server becomes ready receive requests.

name: entryPoint
desc: The cached entrypoint of channel.

name: hubSink
desc: Target for sending messages to other ApplicationChannel.messageHubs.

name: identifier
desc: The unique identifier of this instance.

name: logger
desc: The logger of this instance

name: options
desc: The configuration this instance used to start its channel.

name: requiresHTTPS
desc: Whether or not this server requires an HTTPS listener.

name: server
desc: The underlying HttpServer.

name: start
desc: Starts this instance, allowing it to receive HTTP requests.

name: ApplicationStartupException
desc: Thrown when an application encounters an exception during startup.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: AuthBasicCredentials
desc: A structure to hold Basic authorization credentials.

name: password
desc: The password of a Basic Authorization header.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: username
desc: The username of a Basic Authorization header.

name: AuthClient
desc: Represents an OAuth 2.0 client ID and secret pair.

name: AuthClient
desc: Creates an instance of AuthClient.

name: allowedScopes
desc: The list of scopes available when authorizing with this client.

name: allowsScope
desc: Whether or not this client can issue tokens for the provided scope.

name: hashedSecret
desc: The hashed secret of the client.

name: id
desc: The ID of the client.

name: isConfidential
desc: Whether or not this is a public or confidential client.

name: isPublic
desc: Whether or not this is a public or confidential client.

name: AuthClient.public
desc: Creates an instance of a public AuthClient.

name: redirectURI
desc: The redirection URI for authorization codes and/or tokens.

name: salt
desc: The salt hashedSecret was hashed with.

name: supportsScopes
desc: Whether or not this instance allows scoping or not.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: AuthClient.withRedirectURI
desc: Creates an instance of AuthClient that uses the authorization code grant flow.

name: AuthCode
desc: Represents an OAuth 2.0 authorization code.

name: clientID
desc: The client ID the authorization code was issued under.

name: code
desc: The actual one-time code used to exchange for tokens.

name: expirationDate
desc: When this authorization code expires, recommended for 10 minutes after issue date.

name: hasBeenExchanged
desc: Whether or not this authorization code has already been exchanged for a token.

name: isExpired
desc: Whether or not this code has expired yet, according to its expirationDate.

name: issueDate
desc: The timestamp this authorization code was issued on.

name: requestedScopes
desc: Scopes the exchanged token will have.

name: resourceOwnerIdentifier
desc: The identifier of the resource owner.

name: AuthCodeController
desc: Controller for issuing OAuth 2.0 authorization codes.

name: AuthCodeController
desc: Creates a new instance of an AuthCodeController.

name: authServer
desc: A reference to the AuthServer used to grant authorization codes.

name: authorize
desc: Creates a one-time use authorization code.

name: clientID
desc: The client ID of the authenticating client.

name: delegate
desc: Renders an HTML login form.

name: documentOperationParameters
desc: Returns a documented list of APIParameter for operation.

name: documentOperationRequestBody
desc: Returns a documented request body for operation.

name: documentOperationResponses
desc: Returns a map of possible responses for operation.

name: documentOperations
desc: Tells this object to return all APIOperations it handles.

name: getAuthorizationPage
desc: Returns an HTML login form.

name: responseType
desc: Must be 'code'.

name: state
desc: A randomly generated value the client can use to verify the origin of the redirect.

name: AuthCodeControllerDelegate
desc: Provides AuthCodeController with application-specific behavior.

name: render
desc: Returns an HTML representation of a login form.

name: AuthController
desc: Controller for issuing and refreshing OAuth 2.0 access tokens.

name: AuthController
desc: Creates a new instance of an AuthController.

name: authHeader
desc: Required basic authentication Authorization header containing client ID and secret for the authenticating client.

name: authServer
desc: A reference to the AuthServer this controller uses to grant tokens.

name: documentOperationParameters
desc: Returns a documented list of APIParameter for operation.

name: documentOperationRequestBody
desc: Returns a documented request body for operation.

name: documentOperationResponses
desc: Returns a map of possible responses for operation.

name: documentOperations
desc: Tells this object to return all APIOperations it handles.

name: grant
desc: Creates or refreshes an authentication token.

name: tokenResponse
desc:
Transforms a AuthToken into a Response object with an RFC6749 compliant JSON token
as the HTTP response body.

name: willSendResponse
desc: Executed prior to Response being sent.

name: AuthRedirectController
desc: Controller for issuing OAuth 2.0 authorization codes and tokens.

name: AuthRedirectController
desc: Creates a new instance of an AuthRedirectController.

name: allowsImplicit
desc: When true, the controller allows for the Implicit Grant Flow

name: authServer
desc: A reference to the AuthServer used to grant authorization codes and access tokens.

name: authorize
desc: Creates a one-time use authorization code or an access token.

name: clientID
desc: The client ID of the authenticating client.

name: delegate
desc: Renders an HTML login form.

name: documentOperationParameters
desc: Returns a documented list of APIParameter for operation.

name: documentOperationRequestBody
desc: Returns a documented request body for operation.

name: documentOperationResponses
desc: Returns a map of possible responses for operation.

name: documentOperations
desc: Tells this object to return all APIOperations it handles.

name: getAuthorizationPage
desc: Returns an HTML login form.

name: responseType
desc: Must be 'code' or 'token'.

name: state
desc: A randomly generated value the client can use to verify the origin of the redirect.

name: AuthRedirectControllerDelegate
desc: Provides AuthRedirectController with application-specific behavior.

name: render
desc: Returns an HTML representation of a login form.

name: AuthRequestError
desc: The possible errors as defined by the OAuth 2.0 specification.

name: values
desc: A constant List of the values in this enum, in order of their declaration.

name: AuthScope
desc: Instances represent OAuth 2.0 scope.

name: AuthScope
desc: Creates an instance of this type from scopeString.

name: allows
desc: String variant of isSubsetOrEqualTo.

name: allowsScope
desc: Alias of isSubsetOrEqualTo.

name: any
desc: Signifies 'any' scope in AuthServerDelegate.getAllowedScopes.

name: isExactly
desc: String variant of isExactlyScope.

name: isExactlyScope
desc: Whether or not two scopes are exactly the same.

name: isSubsetOrEqualTo
desc: Whether or not this instance is a subset or equal to incomingScope.

name: modifier
desc: The modifier of this scope, if it exists.

name: segments
desc: Individual segments, separated by : character, of this instance.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: verify
desc: Returns true if that providedScopes fulfills requiredScopes.

name: AuthServer
desc: A OAuth 2.0 authorization server.

name: AuthServer
desc: Creates a new instance of an AuthServer with a delegate.

name: addClient
desc: Adds an OAuth2 client.

name: authenticate
desc: Authenticates a username and password of an ResourceOwner and returns an AuthToken upon success.

name: authenticateForCode
desc: Creates a one-time use authorization code for a given client ID and user credentials.

name: delegate
desc: The object responsible for carrying out the storage mechanisms of this instance.

name: documentedAuthorizationCodeFlow
desc: Used during OpenAPI documentation.

name: documentedImplicitFlow
desc: Used during OpenAPI documentation.

name: documentedPasswordFlow
desc: Used during OpenAPI documentation.

name: exchange
desc: Exchanges a valid authorization code for an AuthToken.

name: getClient
desc: Returns a AuthClient record for its clientID.

name: hashFunction
desc: The Hash function used by the PBKDF2 algorithm to generate password hashes by this instance.

name: hashLength
desc: The resulting key length of a password hash when generated by this instance.

name: hashPassword
desc: Hashes a password with salt using PBKDF2 algorithm.

name: hashRounds
desc: The number of hashing rounds performed by this instance when validating a password.

name: refresh
desc: Refreshes a valid AuthToken instance.

name: removeClient
desc: Revokes a AuthClient record.

name: revokeAllGrantsForResourceOwner
desc: Revokes access for an ResourceOwner.

name: validate
desc: Returns an Authorization if authorizationData is valid.

name: verify
desc: Returns a Authorization for accessToken.

name: AuthServerDelegate
desc: The methods used by an AuthServer to store information and customize behavior related to authorization.

name: addClient
desc: Must store client.

name: addCode
desc: Must store code.

name: addToken
desc: Must store token.

name: getAllowedScopes
desc: Returns list of allowed scopes for a given ResourceOwner.

name: getClient
desc: Must return AuthClient for a client ID.

name: getCode
desc: Must return AuthCode for its identifiying code.

name: getResourceOwner
desc: Must return a ResourceOwner for a username.

name: getToken
desc: Returns a AuthToken searching by its access token or refresh token.

name: removeClient
desc: Removes an AuthClient for a client ID.

name: removeCode
desc: Must remove AuthCode identified by code.

name: removeToken
desc: Must delete a AuthToken granted by grantedByCode.

name: removeTokens
desc: This method must delete all AuthToken and AuthCodes for a ResourceOwner.

name: updateToken
desc: Must update AuthToken with [newAccessToken, [newIssueDate, newExpirationDate.

name: AuthServerException
desc: An exception thrown by AuthServer.

name: errorString
desc:
Returns a string suitable to be included in a query string or JSON response body
to indicate the error during processing an OAuth 2.0 request.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: AuthToken
desc: Represents an OAuth 2.0 token.

name: accessToken
desc: The value to be passed as a Bearer Authorization header.

name: asMap
desc: Emits this instance as a Map according to the OAuth 2.0 specification.

name: clientID
desc: The client ID this token was issued from.

name: expirationDate
desc: The time when this token expires.

name: isExpired
desc: Whether or not this token is expired by evaluated expirationDate.

name: issueDate
desc: The time this token was issued on.

name: refreshToken
desc: The value to be passed for refreshing a token.

name: resourceOwnerIdentifier
desc: The identifier of the resource owner.

name: scopes
desc: Scopes this token has access to.

name: type
desc: The type of token, currently only 'bearer' is valid.

name: AuthValidator
desc: Instances that implement this type can be used by an Authorizer to determine authorization of a request.

name: documentRequirementsForAuthorizer
desc: Provide APISecurityRequirements for authorizer.

name: validate
desc: Returns an Authorization if authorizationData is valid.

name: Authorization
desc: Authorization information for a Request after it has passed through an Authorizer.

name: Authorization
desc: Creates an instance of a Authorization.

name: clientID
desc: The client ID the permission was granted under.

name: credentials
desc: Basic authorization credentials, if provided.

name: isAuthorizedForScope
desc: Whether or not this instance has access to a specific scope.

name: ownerID
desc: The identifier for the owner of the resource, if provided.

name: scopes
desc: The list of scopes this authorization has access to.

name: validator
desc: The AuthValidator that granted this permission.

name: AuthorizationBasicParser
desc: Parses a Basic Authorization header.

name: parse
desc:
Returns a AuthBasicCredentials containing the username and password
base64 encoded in authorizationHeader. For example, if the input to this method
was 'Basic base64String' it would decode the base64String
and return the username and password by splitting that decoded string around the character ':'.

name: AuthorizationBearerParser
desc: Parses a Bearer token from an Authorization header.

name: parse
desc:
Parses a Bearer token from authorizationHeader. If the header is malformed or doesn't exist,
throws an AuthorizationParserException. Otherwise, returns the String representation of the bearer token.

name: AuthorizationParserException
desc: An exception indicating why Authorization parsing failed.

name: AuthorizationParserExceptionReason
desc: The reason either AuthorizationBearerParser or AuthorizationBasicParser failed.

name: values
desc: A constant List of the values in this enum, in order of their declaration.

name: Authorizer
desc: A Controller that validates the Authorization header of a request.

name: Authorizer
desc: Creates an instance of Authorizer.

name: Authorizer.basic
desc: Creates an instance of Authorizer with Basic Authentication parsing.

name: Authorizer.bearer
desc: Creates an instance of Authorizer with Bearer token parsing.

name: documentComponents
desc: Tells this object to add its components to context.

name: documentOperations
desc: Tells this object to return all APIOperations it handles.

name: handle
desc: The primary request handling method of this object.

name: parser
desc: Parses the Authorization header.

name: scopes
desc: The list of required scopes.

name: validator
desc: The validating authorization object.

name: Bind
desc: Binds elements of an HTTP request to a ResourceController's operation method arguments and properties.

name: Bind.body
desc: Binds an HTTP request body to an ResourceController property or operation method argument.

name: Bind.header
desc: Binds an HTTP request header to an ResourceController property or operation method argument.

name: Bind.path
desc: Binds a route variable from RequestPath.variables to an ResourceController operation method argument.

name: Bind.query
desc: Binds an HTTP query parameter to an ResourceController property or operation method argument.

name: values
desc: A constant List of the values in this enum, in order of their declaration.

name: BodyDecoder
desc: Decodes bytes according to contentType.

name: as
desc: Returns previously decoded object as T.

name: bytes
desc: The stream of bytes to decode.

name: contentType
desc: Determines how bytes get decoded.

name: decode
desc: Decodes this object's bytes as T.

name: decodedType
desc: The type of data bytes was decoded into.

name: hasBeenDecoded
desc: Whether or not bytes have been decoded yet.

name: isEmpty
desc: Whether or not bytes is empty.

name: originalBytes
desc: The raw bytes of this request body.

name: retainOriginalBytes
desc: Whether or not bytes are available as a list after decoding has occurred.

name: CORSPolicy
desc: Describes a CORS policy for a Controller.

name: CORSPolicy
desc: Create a new instance of CORSPolicy.

name: allowCredentials
desc: Whether or not to allow use of credentials, including Authorization and cookies.

name: allowedMethods
desc: Which HTTP methods are allowed.

name: allowedOrigins
desc: The list of case-sensitive allowed origins.

name: allowedRequestHeaders
desc: The allowed request headers.

name: cacheInSeconds
desc: The number of seconds to cache a pre-flight request for a requesting client.

name: defaultPolicy
desc: The default CORS policy.

name: exposedResponseHeaders
desc: Which response headers to expose to the client.

name: headersForRequest
desc: Returns a map of HTTP headers for a request based on this policy.

name: isRequestOriginAllowed
desc: Whether or not this policy allows the Origin of the request.

name: preflightResponse
desc: Returns a preflight response for a given Request.

name: simpleRequestHeaders
desc: List of 'Simple' CORS headers.

name: simpleResponseHeaders
desc: List of 'Simple' CORS Response headers.

name: validatePreflightRequest
desc: Validates whether or not a preflight request matches this policy.

name: CachePolicy
desc: Instances of this type provide configuration for the 'Cache-Control' header.

name: CachePolicy
desc: Creates a new cache policy.

name: expirationFromNow
desc: Sets how long a resource is valid for.

name: headerValue
desc: Constructs a header value configured from this instance.

name: preventCaching
desc: Prevents any caching of a response by a proxy or client.

name: preventIntermediateProxyCaching
desc: Prevents a response from being cached by an intermediate proxy.

name: requireConditionalRequest
desc: Requires a client to send a conditional GET to use a cached response.

name: CodecRegistry
desc: Provides encoding and decoding services based on the ContentType of a Request or Response.

name: add
desc: Adds a custom codec for contentType.

name: codecForContentType
desc: Returns a Codec for contentType.

name: defaultInstance
desc: The instance used by Conduit to encode and decode HTTP bodies.

name: isContentTypeCompressable
desc: Whether or not contentType has been configured to be compressed.

name: setAllowsCompression
desc: Toggles whether HTTP bodies of contentType are compressed with GZIP.

name: Column
desc: Metadata to describe the behavior of the underlying database column of a persistent property in ManagedObject subclasses.

name: Column
desc: Creates an instance of this type.

name: autoincrement
desc: A sequence generator will be used to generate the next value for this column when a row is inserted.

name: databaseType
desc: The type of the field in the database.

name: defaultValue
desc: The default value of the property.

name: isIndexed
desc: Whether or not the backing database should generate an index for this property.

name: isNullable
desc: Indicates whether or not the property can be null or not.

name: isPrimaryKey
desc: When true, indicates that this property is the primary key.

name: isUnique
desc: Whether or not the property is unique among all instances.

name: name
desc: The name of the underlying column in table.

name: shouldOmitByDefault
desc: Whether or not fetching an instance of this type should include this property.

name: useSnakeCaseName
desc: Useful to indicate using new snake_case naming convention if name is not set

name: validators
desc: A list of validators to apply to the annotated property.

name: compile
desc: Returns a map of runtime objects that can be used at runtime while running in mirrored mode.

name: deflectPackage
desc: Modifies a package on the filesystem in order to remove dart:mirrors from the package.

name: Configuration
desc:
Subclasses of Configuration read YAML strings and files, assigning values from the YAML document to properties
of an instance of this type.

name: Configuration
desc: Default constructor.

name: decode
desc: Ingests value into the properties of this type.

name: Configuration.fromFile
desc: Opens a file and reads its string contents into this instance's properties.

name: Configuration.fromString
desc: contents must be YAML.

name: validate
desc: Validates this configuration.

name: compile
desc: Returns a map of runtime objects that can be used at runtime while running in mirrored mode.

name: deflectPackage
desc: Modifies a package on the filesystem in order to remove dart:mirrors from the package.

name: ConfigurationError
desc: Thrown when Configuration subclass is invalid and requires a change in code.

name: message
desc: The reason for the error.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: type
desc: The type of Configuration in which this error appears in.

name: ConfigurationException
desc: Thrown when reading data into a Configuration fails.

name: configuration
desc: The Configuration in which this exception occurred.

name: keyPath
desc: The key of the object being evaluated.

name: message
desc: The reason for the exception.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: ConfigurationItemAttribute
desc: Configuration properties may be attributed with these.

name: ConfigurationItemAttributeType
desc: Possible options for a configuration item property's optionality.

name: values
desc: A constant List of the values in this enum, in order of their declaration.

name: Controller
desc: Base class for request handling objects.

name: didAddToChannel
desc: Lifecycle callback, invoked after added to channel, but before any requests are served.

name: documentComponents
desc: Tells this object to add its components to context.

name: documentOperations
desc: Tells this object to return all APIOperations it handles.

name: documentPaths
desc: Tells this object to return all APIPaths it handles.

name: handle
desc: The primary request handling method of this object.

name: handleError
desc: Sends an HTTP response for a request that yields an exception or error.

name: includeErrorDetailsInServerErrorResponses
desc: Returns a stacktrace and additional details about how the request's processing in the HTTP response.

name: letUncaughtExceptionsEscape
desc: Whether or not to allow uncaught exceptions escape request controllers.

name: link
desc: Links a controller to the receiver to form a request channel.

name: linkFunction
desc: Links a function controller to the receiver to form a request channel.

name: logger
desc: An instance of the 'conduit' logger.

name: nextController
desc: Receives requests that this controller does not respond to.

name: policy
desc: The CORS policy of this controller.

name: receive
desc: Delivers req to this instance to be processed.

name: willSendResponse
desc: Executed prior to Response being sent.

name: DatabaseConfiguration
desc: A Configuration to represent a database connection configuration.

name: DatabaseConfiguration
desc: Default constructor.

name: databaseName
desc: The name of the database to connect to.

name: decode
desc: Ingests value into the properties of this type.

name: host
desc: The host of the database to connect to.

name: isTemporary
desc: A flag to represent permanence.

name: password
desc: A password for authenticating to the database.

name: port
desc: The port of the database to connect to.

name: username
desc: A username for authenticating to the database.

name: DatabaseConfiguration.withConnectionInfo
desc: A named constructor that contains all of the properties of this instance.

name: DeleteRule
desc: Possible values for a delete rule in a Relate.

name: values
desc: A constant List of the values in this enum, in order of their declaration.

name: Document
desc: Allows storage of unstructured data in a ManagedObject property.

name: Document
desc: Creates an instance with an optional initial data.

name: operator []
desc: Returns an element of data by index or key.

name: operator []=
desc: Sets an element of data by index or key.

name: data
desc: The JSON-encodable data contained by this instance.

name: FileController
desc: Serves files from a directory on the filesystem.

name: FileController
desc: Creates a controller that serves files from pathOfDirectoryToServe.

name: addCachePolicy
desc: Add a cache policy for file paths that return true for shouldApplyToPath.

name: cachePolicyForPath
desc: Returns the CachePolicy for path.

name: contentTypeForExtension
desc: Returns a ContentType for a file extension.

name: documentOperations
desc: Tells this object to return all APIOperations it handles.

name: handle
desc: The primary request handling method of this object.

name: setContentTypeForExtension
desc: Sets the associated content type for a file extension.

name: Linkable
desc: An interface for linking controllers.

name: link
desc: See Controller.link.

name: linkFunction
desc: See Controller.linkFunction.

name: ManagedAttributeDescription
desc: Stores the specifics of database columns in ManagedObjects as indicated by Column.

name: convertFromPrimitiveValue
desc: Converts a value to a more complex value from a primitive value according to this instance's definition.

name: convertToPrimitiveValue
desc: Converts a value from a more complex value into a primitive value according to this instance's definition.

name: defaultValue
desc: The default value for this attribute.

name: documentSchemaObject
desc: Returns an APISchemaObject that represents this property.

name: enumerationValueMap
desc: Contains lookup table for string value of an enumeration to the enumerated value.

name: isEnumeratedValue
desc: Whether or not this attribute is represented by a Dart enum.

name: isPrimaryKey
desc: Whether or not this attribute is the primary key for its ManagedEntity.

name: isTransient
desc: Whether or not this attribute is backed directly by the database.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: transientStatus
desc: The validity of a transient attribute as input, output or both.

name: ManagedBacking
desc: Instances of this class provide storage for ManagedObjects.

name: contents
desc: A map of all set values of this instance.

name: removeProperty
desc: Removes a property from this instance.

name: setValueForProperty
desc: Sets a property by its entity and name.

name: valueForProperty
desc: Retrieve a property by its entity and name.

name: ManagedContext
desc: A service object that handles connecting to and sending queries to a database.

name: ManagedContext
desc: Creates an instance of ManagedContext from a ManagedDataModel and PersistentStore.

name: ManagedContext.childOf
desc: Creates a child context from parentContext.

name: close
desc: Closes this context and release its underlying resources.

name: dataModel
desc: The data model containing the ManagedEntitys that describe the ManagedObjects this instance works with.

name: documentComponents
desc: Tells this object to add its components to context.

name: entityForType
desc: Returns an entity for a type from dataModel.

name: fetchObjectWithID
desc: Returns an object of type T from this context if it exists, otherwise returns null.

name: insertObject
desc: Inserts a single object into this context.

name: insertObjects
desc: Inserts each object in objects into this context.

name: persistentStore
desc: The persistent store that Querys on this context are executed through.

name: transaction
desc: Runs all Querys in transactionBlock within a database transaction.

name: ManagedDataModel
desc: Instances of this class contain descriptions and metadata for mapping ManagedObjects to database rows.

name: ManagedDataModel
desc:
Creates an instance of ManagedDataModel from a list of types that extend ManagedObject. It is preferable
to use ManagedDataModel.fromCurrentMirrorSystem over this method.

name: documentComponents
desc: Tells this object to add its components to context.

name: entityForType
desc: Returns a ManagedEntity for a Type.

name: ManagedDataModel.fromCurrentMirrorSystem
desc: Creates an instance of a ManagedDataModel from all subclasses of ManagedObject in all libraries visible to the calling library.

name: ManagedDataModelError
desc: Thrown when a ManagedDataModel encounters an error.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: ManagedEntity
desc: Mapping information between a table in a database and a ManagedObject object.

name: operator ==
desc: Two entities are considered equal if they have the same tableName.

name: ManagedEntity
desc: Creates an instance of this type..

name: attributes
desc: All attribute values of this entity.

name: defaultProperties
desc: The list of default property names of this object.

name: documentComponents
desc: Tells this object to add its components to context.

name: hashCode
desc: Derived from this' tableName.

name: identifyAttribute
desc: Returns an attribute in this entity for a property selector.

name: identifyProperties
desc: Returns a list of properties selected by propertiesIdentifier.

name: identifyProperty
desc: Returns a property selected by propertyIdentifier.

name: identifyRelationship
desc: Returns a relationship in this entity for a property selector.

name: instanceOf
desc: Creates a new instance of this entity's instance type.

name: instanceType
desc: The type of instances represented by this entity.

name: name
desc: The name of this entity.

name: primaryKey
desc: Name of primary key property.

name: properties
desc: All properties (relationships and attributes) of this entity.

name: relationships
desc: All relationship values of this entity.

name: runtime
desc: Set of callbacks that are implemented differently depending on compilation target.

name: symbolMap
desc: A map from accessor symbol name to property name.

name: tableDefinition
desc: The name of type of persistent instances represented by this entity.

name: tableName
desc: Name of table in database this entity maps to.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: uniquePropertySet
desc: Set of properties that, together, are unique for each instance of this entity.

name: validators
desc: List of ManagedValidators for attributes of this entity.

name: ManagedObject
desc: An object that represents a database row.

name: operator []
desc: Retrieves a value by property name from backing.

name: operator []=
desc: Sets a value by property name in backing.

name: asMap
desc: Converts this instance into a serializable map.

name: backing
desc: The persistent values of this object.

name: documentSchema
desc: Returns an APISchemaObject describing this object's type.

name: entity
desc: The ManagedEntity this instance is described by.

name: hasValueForProperty
desc: Checks whether or not a property has been set in this instances' backing.

name: noSuchMethod
desc: Invoked when a non-existent method or property is accessed.

name: properties
desc: IMPROVEMENT: Cache of entity.properties to reduce property loading time

name: readFromMap
desc: Reads values from object.

name: removePropertiesFromBackingMap
desc: Removes multiple properties from backing.

name: removePropertyFromBackingMap
desc: Removes a property from backing.

name: responseKeyProperties
desc: Cache of entity.properties using ResponseKey name as key, in case no ResponseKey is set then default property name is used as key

name: validate
desc: Validates an object according to its property Validate metadata.

name: willInsert
desc: Callback to modify an object prior to inserting it with a Query.

name: willUpdate
desc: Callback to modify an object prior to updating it with a Query.

name: ManagedObjectController
desc: A Controller that implements basic CRUD operations for a ManagedObject.

desc: Creates an instance of a ManagedObjectController.

name: didDeleteObjectWithID
desc: Executed after an object was deleted.

name: didFindObject
desc: Executed after a fetch by ID query that found a matching instance.

name: didFindObjects
desc: Executed after a list of objects has been fetched.

name: didInsertObject
desc: Executed after an insert query is successful.

name: didNotFindObject
desc: Executed after a fetch by ID query that did not find a matching instance.

name: didNotFindObjectToDeleteWithID
desc: Executed when no object was deleted during a delete query.

name: didNotFindObjectToUpdateWithID
desc: Executed after an object not found during an update query.

name: didUpdateObject
desc: Executed after an object was updated.

name: documentOperationRequestBody
desc: Returns a documented request body for operation.

name: documentOperationResponses
desc: Returns a map of possible responses for operation.

name: documentOperations
desc: Tells this object to return all APIOperations it handles.

name: ManagedObjectController.forEntity
desc: Creates a new ManagedObjectController without a static type.

name: routePattern
desc: Returns a route pattern for using ManagedObjectControllers.

name: willDeleteObjectWithQuery
desc: Executed prior to a delete query being executed.

name: willFindObjectWithQuery
desc: Executed prior to a fetch by ID query.

name: willFindObjectsWithQuery
desc: Executed prior to a fetch query being executed.

name: willInsertObjectWithQuery
desc: Executed prior to an insert query being executed.

name: willUpdateObjectWithQuery
desc: Executed prior to a update query being executed.

name: ManagedPropertyDescription

desc: Whether or not this property should use an auto-incrementing scheme.

desc: Whether or not this property is returned in the default set of Query.returningProperties.

desc: Whether or not this property should be indexed by a PersistentStore.

name: isNullable
desc: Whether or not this property can be null.

name: isUnique

name: name
desc: The identifying name of this property.

name: type
desc: The value type of this property.

desc: ManagedValidators for this instance.

desc: Converts a value to a more complex value from a primitive value according to this instance's definition.

desc: Converts a value from a more complex value into a primitive value according to this instance's definition.

name: ManagedRelationshipType

name: values

desc: Creates a new instance.

desc: Whether dartValue can be assigned to properties with this type.

name: isEnumerated

desc: The primitive kind of this type.

desc: A string representation of this object.

desc: Dart representation of this type.

desc: The metadata associated with this instance.

name: run

name: Migration
desc: The base class for migration instructions.

desc: The current state of the Schema.

desc: Method invoked to seed a database's data after this migration version is upgraded to.

desc: Method invoked to upgrade a database to this migration version.

name: MigrationException

desc: A string representation of this object.

desc: Closes the underlying database connection.

name: execute

desc: A constant List of the values in this enum, in order of their declaration.

name: Query
desc: An object for configuring and executing a database query.

name: Query
desc: Creates a new Query.

name: canModifyAllInstances
desc: Confirms that a query has no predicate before executing it.

name: context
desc: The ManagedContext this query will be executed on.

name: delete
desc: Deletes InstanceTypes from the underlying database.

name: entity
desc: The ManagedEntity of the InstanceType.

name: fetch
desc: Fetches InstanceTypes from the database.

name: fetchLimit
desc: Limits the number of objects returned from the Query.

name: fetchOne
desc: Fetches a single InstanceType from the database.

name: Query.forEntity
desc: Creates a new Query without a static type.

name: insert
desc: Inserts an InstanceType into the underlying database.

name: insertMany
desc: Inserts an InstanceTypes into the underlying database.

name: insertObject
desc: Inserts a single object into the database managed by context.

name: insertObjects
desc: Inserts each object in objects into the database managed by context in a single transaction.

name: join
desc: Configures this instance to fetch a relationship property identified by object or set.

name: offset
desc: Offsets the rows returned.

name: pageBy
desc: Configures this instance to fetch a section of a larger result set.

name: predicate
desc: A predicate for filtering the result or operation set.

name: reduce
desc: Returns a new object that can execute functions like sum, average, maximum, etc.

name: returningProperties
desc: Configures the list of properties to be fetched for InstanceType.

name: sortBy
desc: Configures this instance to sort its results by some property and order.

name: timeoutInSeconds
desc: Number of seconds before a Query times out.

name: update
desc: Updates InstanceTypes in the underlying database.

name: updateOne
desc: Updates an InstanceType in the underlying database.

name: valueMap
desc: Values to be used when inserting or updating an object.

name: values
desc: Values to be sent to database during an update or insert query.

name: where
desc: Selects a property from the object being queried to add a filtering expression.

A partial class for implementing an ResourceController that has a few conveniences
for executing Querys.

desc: Create an instance of QueryController.

name: didDecodeRequestBody
desc: Callback to indicate when a request body has been processed.

name: query
desc: A query representing the values received from the request being processed.

name: willProcessRequest
desc: Executed prior to handling a request, but after the request has been set.

desc: An exception describing an issue with a query.

name: event
desc: The type of event that caused this exception.

desc: A string representation of this object.

name: values
desc: A constant List of the values in this enum, in order of their declaration.

desc: Adds a 'begins with string' expression to a query.

desc: Adds a 'between two values' expression to a query.

name: contains
desc: Adds a 'contains string' expression to a query.

name: endsWith
desc: Adds a 'ends with string' expression to a query.

name: equalTo
desc: Adds an equality expression to a query.

name: greaterThan
desc: Adds a 'greater than' expression to a query.

name: greaterThanEqualTo
desc: Adds a 'greater than or equal to' expression to a query.

name: identifiedBy
desc: Adds an equality expression for foreign key columns to a query.

name: isNotNull
desc: Adds a 'not null check' expression to a query.

name: isNull
desc: Adds a 'null check' expression to a query.

name: lessThan
desc: Adds a 'less than' expression to a query.

name: lessThanEqualTo
desc: Adds a 'less than or equal to' expression to a query.

name: like
desc: Adds a like expression to a query.

name: not
desc: Inverts the next expression.

name: notEqualTo
desc: Adds a 'not equal' expression to a query.

name: notLike
desc: Adds a 'not like' expression to a query.

name: oneOf
desc: Adds a 'equal to one of' expression to a query.

name: outsideOf
desc: Adds a 'outside of the range crated by two values' expression to a query.

name: QueryExpressionJunction
desc: Contains binary logic operations to be applied to a QueryExpression.

desc: Confirms that a query has no predicate before executing it.

desc: Limits the number of objects returned from the Query.

desc: Offsets the rows returned.

desc: Configures this instance to fetch a section of a larger result set.

desc: A predicate for filtering the result or operation set.

name: returningProperties
desc: Configures the list of properties to be fetched for InstanceType.

name: sortBy
desc: Configures this instance to sort its results by some property and order.

name: timeoutInSeconds
desc: Number of seconds before a Query times out.

desc: Values to be used when inserting or updating an object.

name: values
desc: Values to be sent to database during an update or insert query.

desc: Selects a property from the object being queried to add a filtering expression.

desc: Default constructor

desc: A map of values to replace in the format string at execution time.

desc: Executes aggregate functions like average, count, sum, etc.

name: count

desc: A constant List of the values in this enum, in order of their declaration.

name: Request

desc: Creates an instance of Request, no need to do so manually.

name: acceptableContentTypes
desc: The acceptable content types for a Response returned for this instance.

name: acceptsContentType
desc: Whether a Response may contain a body of type contentType.

name: addResponseModifier
desc: Allows a Controller to modify the response eventually created for this request, without creating that response itself.

name: attachments
desc: Container for any data a Controller wants to attach to this request for the purpose of being used by a later Controller.

desc: The request body object.

desc: Whether or not this is a CORS preflight request.

desc: HTTP method of this request.

desc: The path of the request URI.

desc: The underlying HttpRequest of this instance.

name: receivedDate
desc: The timestamp for when this request was received.

name: respond

name: respondDate
desc: The timestamp for when this request was responded to.

name: response

name: toDebugString

desc: A string representation of this object.

name: variables

desc: Creates an instance of this type with a specific set of tables.

desc: Adds a table to this instance.

desc: Emits this instance as a transportable Map.

desc: The differences between two schemas.

desc: Creates a builder starting from an existing schema.

desc: Validates and renames a table in schema.

desc: The resulting schema of this builder as operations are applied to it.

name: isForeignKey
desc: Whether or not this column is a foreign key column.

name: isIndexed
desc: Whether or not this column is indexed.

name: isNullable
desc: Whether or not this column is nullable.

name: isPrimaryKey
desc: Whether or not this column is the primary key of its table.

name: isUnique
desc: Whether or not this column is unique.

name: name
desc: The name of this column.

name: relatedColumnName
desc: The related column if this column is a foreign key column.

name: relatedTableName
desc: The related table name if this column is a foreign key column.

name: SchemaColumn.relationship
desc: A convenience constructor for properties that represent foreign key relationships.

name: table
desc: The SchemaTable this column belongs to.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: type
desc: The type of this column in a ManagedDataModel.

name: typeFromTypeString
desc: Returns inverse of typeStringForType.

name: typeString
desc: The String representation of this column's type.

name: typeStringForType
desc: Returns string representation of ManagedPropertyType.

name: SchemaColumnDifference
desc: The difference between two compared SchemaColumns.

name: SchemaColumnDifference
desc: Creates a new instance that represents the difference between expectedColumn and actualColumn.

name: actualColumn
desc: The actual column.

name: errorMessages
desc: Human-readable list of differences between expectedColumn and actualColumn.

name: expectedColumn
desc: The expected column.

name: hasDifferences
desc: Whether or not expectedColumn and actualColumn are different.

name: SchemaDifference
desc: The difference between two compared Schemas.

name: SchemaDifference
desc: Creates a new instance that represents the difference between expectedSchema and actualSchema.

name: actualSchema
desc: The 'actual' schema.

name: errorMessages
desc: Human-readable messages to describe differences between expectedSchema and actualSchema.

name: expectedSchema
desc: The 'expected' schema.

name: hasDifferences
desc: Whether or not expectedSchema and actualSchema have differences.

name: tableDifferences
desc: The differences, if any, between tables in expectedSchema and actualSchema.

name: SchemaException
desc: Thrown when a Schema encounters an error.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: SchemaTable
desc: A portable representation of a database table.

name: SchemaTable
desc: Creates an instance of this type with a name, columns and uniqueColumnSetNames.

name: operator []
desc: Returns a SchemaColumn in this instance by its name.

name: addColumn
desc: Adds column to this table.

name: asMap
desc: Returns portable representation of this table.

name: columnForName
desc: Returns a SchemaColumn with name.

name: columns
desc: An unmodifiable list of SchemaColumns in this table.

name: differenceFrom
desc: The differences between two tables.

name: SchemaTable.empty
desc: Creates an empty table.

name: SchemaTable.from
desc: Creates a deep copy of otherTable.

name: SchemaTable.fromEntity
desc: Creates an instance of this type to mirror entity.

name: SchemaTable.fromMap
desc: Creates an instance of this type from map.

name: name
desc: The name of the database table.

name: removeColumn
desc: Removes column from this table.

name: replaceColumn
desc: Replaces existingColumn with newColumn in this table.

name: schema
desc: The Schema this table belongs to.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: uniqueColumnSet
desc: The names of a set of columns that must be unique for each row in this table.

name: SchemaTableDifference
desc: The difference between two SchemaTables.

name: SchemaTableDifference
desc: Creates a new instance that represents the difference between expectedTable and actualTable.

name: actualTable
desc: The actual table.

name: errorMessages
desc: Human-readable list of differences between expectedTable and actualTable.

name: expectedTable
desc: The expected table.

name: hasDifferences
desc: Whether or not expectedTable and actualTable are the same.

name: uniqueSetDifference
desc: The difference between SchemaTable.uniqueColumnSets.

name: SchemaTableUniqueSetDifference
desc: Difference between two SchemaTable.uniqueColumnSets.

name: actualColumnNames
desc: The actual set of unique column names.

name: errorMessages
desc: Human-readable list of differences between expectedColumnNames and actualColumnNames.

name: expectedColumnNames
desc: The expected set of unique column names.

name: hasDifferences
desc: Whether or not expectedColumnNames and actualColumnNames are equivalent.

name: Scope
desc: Allows ResourceControllers to have different scope for each operation method.

name: Scope
desc: Add to ResourceController operation method to require authorization scope.

name: scopes
desc: The list of authorization scopes required.

name: Serializable
desc: Interface for serializable instances to be decoded from an HTTP request body and encoded to an HTTP response body.

name: asMap
desc: Returns a serializable version of an object.

name: documentSchema
desc: Returns an APISchemaObject describing this object's type.

name: read
desc: Reads values from object, after applying filters.

name: readFromMap
desc: Reads values from object.

name: shouldAutomaticallyDocument
desc: Whether a subclass will automatically be registered as a schema component automatically.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: Serialize
desc: Annotation for ManagedObject properties that allows them to participate in ManagedObject.asMap and/or ManagedObject.readFromMap.

name: Serialize
desc: Annotates a ManagedObject property so it can be serialized.

name: isAvailableAsInput
desc: See constructor.

name: isAvailableAsOutput
desc: See constructor.

name: Table
desc: Annotation to configure the table definition of a ManagedObject.

name: Table
desc: Default constructor.

name: name
desc: The name of the underlying database table.

name: Table.unique
desc: Configures each instance of a table definition to be unique for the combination of properties.

name: uniquePropertySet
desc: Each instance of the associated table definition is unique for these properties.

name: useSnakeCaseColumnName
desc:
Useful to indicate using new snake_case naming convention for columns.
This property defaults to false to avoid breaking change ensuring backward compatibility

name: useSnakeCaseName
desc:
Useful to indicate using new snake_case naming convention if name is not set
This property defaults to false to avoid breaking change ensuring backward compatibility

name: Validate
desc: Add as metadata to persistent properties to validate their values before insertion or updating.

name: Validate
desc: Invoke this constructor when creating custom subclasses.

name: Validate.absent
desc: A validator for ensuring a property does not have a value when being inserted or updated.

name: Validate.compare
desc: A validator for comparing a value.

name: compile
desc: Subclasses override this method to perform any one-time initialization tasks and check for correctness.

name: Validate.constant
desc: A validator that ensures a value cannot be modified after insertion.

name: constrainSchemaObject
desc: Adds constraints to an APISchemaObject imposed by this validator.

name: Validate.length
desc: A validator for validating the length of a String.

name: Validate.matches
desc: A validator for matching an input String against a regular expression.

name: Validate.oneOf
desc: A validator for ensuring a value is one of a set of values.

name: Validate.present
desc: A validator for ensuring a property always has a value when being inserted or updated.

name: runOnInsert
desc: Whether or not this validation is checked on insert queries.

name: runOnUpdate
desc: Whether or not this validation is checked on update queries.

name: validate
desc: Validates the input value.

name: ValidateCompilationError
desc: An error thrown during validator compilation.

name: Validating
desc: Types of operations ManagedValidators will be triggered for.

name: values
desc: A constant List of the values in this enum, in order of their declaration.

name: ValidationContext
desc: Information about a validation being performed.

name: addError
desc: Adds a validation error to the context.

name: errors
desc: Errors that have occurred in this context.

name: event
desc: Whether this validation is occurring during update or insert.

name: isValid
desc: Whether this validation context passed all validations.

name: property
desc: The property being validated.

name: state
desc: State associated with the validator being run.

name: ValidationException
desc: An exception thrown when an ORM property validator is violated.

name: generateAPICredentialPair
desc: A utility method to generate a ClientID and Client Secret Pair.

name: generatePasswordHash
desc: A utility method to generate a password hash using the PBKDF2 scheme.

name: generateRandomSalt
desc: A utility method to generate a random base64 salt.

name: conduit.managed_auth
desc: Library for implementing OAuth 2.0 storage using ManagedObjects.

name: ManagedAuthClient
desc: Represent OAuth 2.0 clients.

name: ManagedAuthClient
desc: Default constructor.

name: allowedScope
desc: Scopes that this client allows.

name: asClient
desc: As an AuthClient.

name: ManagedAuthClient.fromClient
desc: Create from an AuthClient.

name: hashedSecret
desc: The client secret, hashed with salt, if this client is confidential.

name: id
desc: The client identifier of this client.

name: redirectURI
desc: The redirect URI for the authorization code flow.

name: salt
desc: The hashing salt for hashedSecret.

name: tokens
desc: Tokens that have been issued for this client.

name: ManagedAuthDelegate
desc: AuthServerDelegate implementation for an AuthServer using ManagedObjects.

name: ManagedAuthDelegate
desc: Creates an instance of this type.

name: addClient
desc: Must store client.

name: addCode
desc: Must store code.

name: addToken
desc: Must store token.

name: context
desc: The ManagedContext this instance uses to store and retrieve values.

name: getClient
desc: Must return AuthClient for a client ID.

name: getCode
desc: Must return AuthCode for its identifiying code.

name: getResourceOwner
desc: Must return a ResourceOwner for a username.

name: getToken
desc: Returns a AuthToken searching by its access token or refresh token.

name: pruneTokens
desc: Deletes expired tokens for resourceOwnerIdentifier.

name: removeClient
desc: Removes an AuthClient for a client ID.

name: removeCode
desc: Must remove AuthCode identified by code.

name: removeToken
desc: Must delete a AuthToken granted by grantedByCode.

name: removeTokens
desc: This method must delete all AuthToken and AuthCodes for a ResourceOwner.

name: tokenLimit
desc: The number of tokens and authorization codes a user can have at a time.

name: updateToken
desc: Must update AuthToken with [newAccessToken, [newIssueDate, newExpirationDate.

name: ManagedAuthResourceOwner
desc: REQUIRED: An OAuth 2.0 Resource Owner as a ManagedObject.

name: ManagedAuthToken
desc: Represent an OAuth 2.0 authorization token and authorization code.

name: ManagedAuthToken
desc: Empty instance.

name: accessToken
desc: The access token of an authorization token.

name: asAuthCode
desc: As an AuthCode.

name: asToken
desc: As an AuthToken.

name: client
desc: The client this token was issued for.

name: code
desc: The authorization code of this token.

name: expirationDate
desc: When this token will expire.

name: ManagedAuthToken.fromCode
desc: Instance from an AuthCode.

name: ManagedAuthToken.fromToken
desc: Instance from an AuthToken.

name: id
desc: A primary key identifier.

name: issueDate
desc: When this token was last issued or refreshed.

name: refreshToken
desc: The refresh token of an authorization token.

name: resourceOwner
desc: The resource owner of this token.

name: scope
desc: Scopes for this token, delimited by the space character.

name: type
desc: The value 'bearer'.

name: ResourceOwnerTableDefinition
desc: REQUIRED: Represents an OAuth 2.0 Resource Owner database table.

name: hashedPassword
desc: The hashed password of a resource owner.

name: id
desc: The primary key of a resource owner.

name: salt
desc: The salt for hashedPassword.

name: tokens
desc: The list of tokens issue for this resource owner.

name: username
desc: The username of a resource owner.

name: optionalConfiguration
desc: A ConfigurationItemAttribute for optional properties.

name: primaryKey
desc: Primary key annotation for a ManagedObject table definition property.

name: requiredBinding
desc: Marks an ResourceController property binding as required.

name: requiredConfiguration
desc: A ConfigurationItemAttribute for required properties.
